content: *this classic baby blanket makes a great gift to new parents lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 cotton-ease® article #830 4 balls *circular needle is used to accommodate large number of stitches knit blanket back and forth in row as if knitting with straight needles * also called 90029ad dansforth ridges 1 2009 90027ad farnsworth blanket 2 2009 90028ad irvington blanket 3 2009 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-dansforth-ridges-blanket-1 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-farnsworth-blanket-1 3 https //www lionbrand com/products/knitting-pattern-irvington-blanket-1
